column4: Preview: Rockets at Kings
column5: The Sacramento Kings are having some trouble closing out games with DeMarcus Cousins out of the lineup. The Kings will try to take advantage of a road-weary Houston Rockets' squad when they open a five-game homestand on Thursday. Cousins (viral meningitis) has missed seven straight games and watched the Kings drop five of those contests  including a 98-95 setback at the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday.
